pullRequest.title: Update CODEOWNERS
pullRequest.bodyText: Add labels for the Auto-label of PRs.

nodes.bodyText: This should have %Azure.Core applied as well
This can have %Azure.Identity for now, and can be changed to a %Common label when additional end-to-end tests are created in the future

nodes.bodyText: @jialindai can you confirm that this should be auto-labeled with https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/labels/azure-spring-data-cosmos ?
Should we add a tag for tracing? If not we should use Core for this.
Could we have the label azure-spring for PRs related to spring?

commit.message:
Update CODEOWNERS

Add labels for the Auto-label of PRs.

Update CODEOWNERS

Update the tracing entry.

Update CODEOWNERS

Changing the format because of the way the CODEOWNERS file is processed by GitHub

Update CODEOWNERS

Add the azure-spring label
